expo.name: Drinkalyze
expo.description: Drinkalyze is an app meant to help solve the ever-growing drinking and driving (DUI) problem. Drinkalyze calculates a user’s Blood Alcohol Concentration and offers a suggested wait time before the user can legally drive. Added features include a history and statistics page to analyze the user’s drinking habits. To test the app you must use an android phone with expo installed to scan the barcode.
